entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Corrupt aapt_rules.txt when Creating a Package per Abi on Android #15800
  • RadioButton VisualStateManager has different behavior on Android #15796
    Backlog
  • RadioButton border doesn't work on Android #15795
    Backlog
  • Border background color on Android is different than iOS #15794
    .NET 8
  • Shell flyout layout is incorrect #15793
    .NET 8
  • Editor Placeholder displays incorrectly on iOS #15792
    .NET 8
  • navHost cannot be null after app2app #15788
    Backlog
  • Android .MAUI Hello World Projects crashed after Time Zone change and crossing country borders in Release Mode #15786
  • Label wordwrap does not honor container MaxWidth #15785
    Backlog
  • Android app does not authenticate, when deployed from play store (using IPublicClientApplication) #15784
  • Entry tab "stretching" bug. #15783
    Backlog
  • iOS: Splash Screen Logo Scaling Issue in MAUI Apps #15782

Closed

  • MAUI with Blazor in a separate library -> 404 on static files #15779
  • Bug Report: SQLite DateTime Property Not Loaded Correctly in Framework #15701
  • Rendering of CollectionView takes too much time #15204
    .NET 8
  • [Windows] CollectionView ItemsUpdatingScrollMode property not working #4116
    Backlog
  • Border Margin on IOS Increases Padding #14051
    Backlog
  • Android binding project error on build step class-parse: Unable to read file #15771
  • ShellContent.IsEnabled = false #12478
    Backlog
  • Improve the InvalidCastException Messages #15545
  • Part of the screen does not get redrawn on window resize #15549
  • Best Practices for SVG and Images #15611

PullRequests

Created

  • Streamline ModalNavigation lifecycle events #15799
  • [GraphicsTester] only build for maccatalyst-x64 #15798
  • [CI] Remove nested templates in the running steps. #15797
  • Split daily code formatting check in 2: .NET 7 branch and main branch #15791
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Formalize virtual layout concepts and fix iOS memory leaks #15303
    area/layout 🔲
  • [uitests] Run Control gallery tests with cake on iOS and Android #15657
    do-not-merge, area/testing
  • [CI] Remove template explosion on the maui templates build tests. #15365
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Sync aar file with latest java changes #15780
  • [net8.0] Use darc for packs from runtime #15731
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • [Windows] Implement ItemsUpdatingScrollMode on CollectionView #15601
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Run daily code formatting on .NET SDK 7.0.304 #15790
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
    area/testing
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md #15777
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Various fixes for Border on Android #15458
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮
  • Refactor `IsRefreshing` property to separate animation and command execution responsibilities #15732
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Essentials] add WiFi permissions on Android 13+ #14718
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix IsEnabled property on Android SearchBar #14616
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲
  • Windows Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu
  • [Android] Fix issue invoking ReturnCommand #14972
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
